title: NEW ULTIMATE SKINS
body: Ok so we have spirit guard udry, pulsfire ezreal and dj sona. Thats jungle, adc and support. Now what if riot introduced ultimate skins for a top lane and mid lane champion? Then you could form an ULTIMATE SKIN TEAM. WHO ELSE AGREES AND THINKS THIS SHOULD HAPPEN?!

replies.body:
If we were to have a top laner. I would pick Zac. I already made a bid for PROJECT: Zac about half a year ago ( [http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/s4EeVVRE-project-zac](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/s4EeVVRE-project-zac) ) but with the recent addition of Project Skins I think this would be better as Mecha Zac. Click the link for the full description of the skin. 

If you were to pick a mid lane champion I think Azir would be a good champion to pick.

Zacs more popular as a jungler than a top isn't he? (I haven't really seen him played too much but so idk)
Mecha Zac would be awesome as hell but I don't think it'd be ultimate teir
Probably go for 1350ish RP

Yeah, he is, mainly because of his W.. He's also really good at clearing the jungle especially as his abilities drop health blobs so he doesn't lose too much health clearing camps. Anyway enough of this off-topic subject.
Yes but he is an awesome top{{champion:154}}
As many skins as Ahri {{champion:103}}  has, I'd love to see her have an Ultimate Skin! I feel as though she is one of the best mid laners overall.
PLEEEASE ULTIMATE YASUO SKIN. damnit if only there was like a forecast yasuo

I reckon Karthus has alot of options for an ultimate skin, saw a concept for 'Ion Cannon Karthus' awhile back where he'd be a mechanised version of himself, like his ult could take the 3 seconds to 'line up' cross-hairs before firing, his q's could be mini missiles or bombs rising out of the ground and exploding, w could be like 2 giant tesla-coil type things firing electricity between each other, and his e could be fallout, or look something like the new Mordekaiser's w. Karthus hasn't had a skin for a long time (team skins dont count according to riot) and this theme could fit along with Pulsefire Ezreal I guess.
As a rengar main I'm disappointed at the fact that he only has 2 skins, THEY SHOULD MAKE ANOTHER RENGAR SKIN. Also I totally agree karth needs some love too <3
I think they would want to cover every role first, just like all the others. :)
